title: How would you become a Digital Nomad with no skill whatsoever if you have one year to prepare for it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Find people with no skill but an incredible will to do the same. I have been working with different groups over 10 years…from my experience I would pick a group who knows nothing over one that knows some of everything 9 out of 10 times. People who don’t know what they don’t know tend to be sponges and by working in groups don’t want to let anyone down…
